meta.title: Tour de France 2017 Start List | Cyclingnews.com

meta.name: description
meta.content: Find out the latest news, stage reports, race scores and expert analysis from the 2017 Tour de France. Cyclingnews.com: The world centre of cycling.

meta.name: news_keywords
meta.content: tour de france 2017 start list, race news, stage reports, race results, race scores, race standings, race commentary, race analysis, cycle racing

li.a:
Stage 5
160.5km
Vittel - La Planche des Belles Filles

Stage 16
165km
Le Puy-en-Velay - Romans sur Isere
